description:
Converts a YouTube video or a multimedia link to MP3 or MP4 directly from the browser:
	NVDA+y, Converts the current video to MP3
	NVDA+Shift+y, Converts the current video to MP4
	NVDA+Control+y, Opens the folder with the converted files
	NVDA+Alt+y, Saves the subtitle of the video as text.

translations.description:
Converts a YouTube video or a multimedia link to MP3 or MP4 directly from the browser:
	NVDA+y, Converts the current video to MP3
	NVDA+Shift+y, Converts the current video to MP4
	NVDA+Control+y, Opens the folder with the converted files
	NVDA+Alt+y, Saves the subtitle of the video as text.

Converts a YouTube video or a multimedia link to MP3 or MP4 directly from the browser:
	NVDA+y, Converts the current video to MP3
	NVDA+Shift+y, Converts the current video to MP4
	NVDA+Control+y, Opens the folder with the converted files
	NVDA+Alt+y, Saves the subtitle of the video as text.

Konvertiert ein YouTube -Video oder einen Multimedia -Link zu MP3 oder MP4 direkt aus dem Browser: \

nvda+y, konvertiert das aktuelle Video in MP3 
nvda+Umschalt+y, konvertiert das aktuelle Video in MP4 
nvda+Steuerung+y, öffnet den Ordner mit den konvertierten Dateien
nvda+Alt+y, speichert den Untertitel des Videos als Text.
